lead_paragraph: BNP Paribas and Societe Generale are interested in bidding for the 70 percent stake in the Polish bank Zachodni that Allied Irish Bank is selling, Reuters reported.
snippet: French banks BNP Paribas and Societe Generale are interested in bidding for the 70 percent stake in Polish bank Zachodni that Allied Irish Bank is selling, Reuters reported.

headline.main: BNP and SocGen Said to Eye A.I.B.'s Zachodni Stake

abstract: French banks BNP Paribas and Societe Generale are interested in bidding for the 70 percent stake in Polish bank Zachodni that Allied Irish Bank is selling, Reuters reported.
